casebody.data:
James TEMPLE, as Attorney-in-Fact FOR Elma Betty TEMPLE, Petitioner
v.
PROVIDENCE CARE CENTER, LLC d/b/a Providence Care Center, Respondent No. 309 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 26, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 26 th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:

(1) Did the Superior Court disregard decades of controlling Supreme Court precedent by affirming the grant of a new trial based upon errors that were not preserved properly at the time of trial?
